Lock(TObject,TProc) Method

Summary

Obtains a mutual-exclusion lock for the given object, executes a procedure and then releases the lock.

Namespace: Spring.Utils
Syntax
Delphi
 procedure Lock(obj: TObject; const proc: TProc); overload;

Parameters

obj
Type: TObject

the sync root.

proc
Type: TProc

the procedure that will be invoked.

Exceptions
Spring.EArgumentNullException
Raised if obj is nil or proc is unassigned.
See Also

Reference

  • Spring.Utils
